column4: When I try to install "ubuntu-10.04-alternate-i386.iso" on my mac the meny doesn't have an option for testing/starting before intalling, why?
You should be able to use esc when the cd first loads
use esc when I see the menu? Then I get prompt asking me to use the text-versio instead of graphical
Sorry, you are using the alternate cd. That may not apply then
